statements: SELECT * FROM retention_strategies;
SELECT user_id, sign_up_date FROM retention_strategies WHERE conversion_status = 'completed';
SELECT user_id, last_activity_date FROM retention_strategies ORDER BY last_activity_date DESC;
SELECT retention_group, COUNT(*) AS count_users FROM retention_strategies GROUP BY retention_group;
SELECT * FROM retention_strategies WHERE sign_up_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT user_id, retention_group, sign_up_date FROM retention_strategies WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM retention_strategies WHERE last_activity_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sign_up_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, retention_group, last_activity_date FROM retention_strategies WHERE conversion_status = 'active' ORDER BY last_activity_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(user_id) AS activity_count FROM retention_strategies GROUP BY user_id HAVING activity_count > 1;
SELECT DISTINCT retention_group FROM retention_strategies WHERE sign_up_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-04-30';
SELECT * FROM retention_strategy WHERE strategy_name = 'A'
SELECT * FROM retention_strategy WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5
SELECT strategy_name, test_group FROM retention_strategy ORDER BY strategy_name DESC
SELECT id, strategy_name, test_group FROM retention_strategy WHERE test_group = 'B'
SELECT id, conversion_rate FROM retention_strategy ORDER BY conversion_rate ASC
SELECT * FROM retention_strategy WHERE strategy_name = 'A/B testing'
SELECT id, strategy_name FROM retention_strategy WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC
SELECT * FROM test_results WHERE user_id = 100 AND conversion_status = true
SELECT id, test_duration FROM test_results WHERE test_id = 10 AND test_duration > INTERVAL '1 hour'
SELECT id, strategy_name, test_group FROM retention_strategy LEFT JOIN test_results ON retention_strategy.id = test_results.test_id
SELECT * FROM retention_strategy;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name FROM retention_strategy ORDER BY strategy_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, signup_date FROM user_data WHERE retention_status='active';
SELECT user_id, test_group FROM user_data WHERE strategy_id=1;
SELECT result_id, conversion_status FROM test_results WHERE test_completion_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM retention_strategy WHERE test_group = 1;
SELECT user_id, signup_date FROM user_data WHERE retention_status = 'active';
SELECT strategy_id, test_group FROM test_results WHERE conversion_status = 'completed' ORDER BY test_completion_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, strategy_id, test_group FROM test_results WHERE conversion_status = 'failed';
SELECT DISTINCT strategy_name FROM retention_strategy;
SELECT * FROM user_data
SELECT user_id, age, gender FROM user_data WHERE age > 30
SELECT user_id, location FROM user_data WHERE gender = 'male'
SELECT * FROM retention_strategy ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT user_id, experiment_group, retention_rate FROM retention_strategy WHERE experiment_group = 2
SELECT * FROM retention_strategy WHERE experiment_group = 1
SELECT user_id, gender FROM user_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY gender ASC
SELECT user_id, conversion_rate FROM experiment_results WHERE experiment_group = 2 AND conversion_rate > 0.5
SELECT * FROM experiment_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC
SELECT user_id, retention_rate FROM retention_strategy JOIN user_data ON retention_strategy.user_id = user_data.user_id
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_description FROM experiments WHERE experiment_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, segment_name FROM user_segments WHERE segment_name = 'high_value';
SELECT * FROM retention_strategies WHERE experiment_start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND experiment_end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM retention_strategies WHERE strategy_id = 1;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name, experiment_start_date, experiment_end_date FROM retention_strategies WHERE strategy_id > 3;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_description FROM experiments WHERE experiment_id BETWEEN 2 AND 5;
SELECT user_id, segment_name FROM user_segments JOIN users ON user_segments.user_id = users.user_id;
